verses.plain: O LORD God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:

tokens.t: O
God of my salvation, I have cried day
night before thee:

verses.plain: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;

tokens.t: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;

verses.plain: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.

tokens.t: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.

verses.plain: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:

tokens.t: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man
no strength:

verses.plain: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.

tokens.t: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.

verses.plain: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.

tokens.t: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.

verses.plain: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.

tokens.t: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted
with all thy waves. Selah.

verses.plain: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.

tokens.t: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them:
shut up, and I cannot come forth.

verses.plain: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: LORD, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.

tokens.t: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction:
, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.

verses.plain: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.

tokens.t: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise
praise thee? Selah.

verses.plain: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?

tokens.t: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave?
thy faithfulness in destruction?

verses.plain: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?

tokens.t: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?

verses.plain: But unto thee have I cried, O LORD; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.

tokens.t: But unto thee have I cried, O
; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.

verses.plain: LORD, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?

tokens.t: , why castest thou off my soul?
hidest thou thy face from me?

verses.plain: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.

tokens.t: I
afflicted and ready to die from
youth up:
I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.

verses.plain: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.

tokens.t: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.

verses.plain: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.

tokens.t: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.

verses.plain: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.

tokens.t: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me,
mine acquaintance into darkness.

footnotes.text: for the sons: or, of the sons
Maschil…: or, A Psalm of Heman the Ezrahite, giving instruction
